thread.title: Louisiana lawmakers look at cost of illegal immigrants
thread.title_full: Louisiana lawmakers look at cost of illegal immigrants - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: FOX8Live.com Staff
title: Louisiana lawmakers look at cost of illegal immigrants
text:
BATON ROUGE, LA (WVUE) - Lawmakers, law enforcement agencies and hospital administrators will be among task force members meeting this week to discuss the cost illegal immigrants have on the State of Louisiana.
A House Task Force on the matter will meet at the State Capitol on Thursday, October 22.
The group will discuss the estimated cost illegal immigrants have on the state's educational, medical and correctional systems.
The task force hopes to analyze the numbers and request a reimbursement from the federal government in order to balance the state's budget.
Among the organizations attending the meeting are the Louisiana Sheriff's Association, Louisiana State Police, Supreme Court Justice, the Center for Security Policy, the Louisiana Hospital Association, the National Federation of Independent Businesses, the Louisiana District Attorney Association, and the Louisiana Power Coalition.
